ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] General Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Not knowing who to ask, and you people seem so nice, can someone help me with  problem i am having.  I will be getting married soon, and we want to have the
ygData.messageBody:
Not knowing who to ask, and you people seem so nice, can someone help me
with problem i am having. I will be getting married soon, and we want to
have the wedding in the Erudin Palace. My problem is that an Ogre friend of
mine swears he will be KOS there.

Does anyone know if this is true, or if there are other races that r KOS
there? Or of a better place to hold a wedding with a very diverse group?

Sorry this isn't the best board to post this on, so forgive me )

Calistaah
17th Season Enchanter, Veeshan
